original_text: A wise servant shall have rule over a son that causeth shame, and shall have part of the inheritance among the brethren.
korean_text: 슬기로운 종은 부끄러운 짓을 하는 주인의 아들을 다스리겠고 또 형제들 중에서 유업을 나누어 얻으리라

sentences.original_text: A wise servant shall have rule
over a son that causeth shame
and shall have part of the inheritance
